alfredsnippet.snippet:
subject = ['Moe','Larry','Curly','Moe','Larry','Curly','Moe','Larry','Curly','Moe','Larry','Curly']
score = [1,6,2,8,2,9,4,5,1,5,2,8]

data = [dict(
  type = 'scatter',
  x = subject,
  y = score,
  mode = 'markers',
  transforms = [dict(
    type = 'aggregate',
    groups = subject,
    aggregations = [dict(
        target = 'y', func = 'sum', enabled = True),
    ]
  )]
)]

iplot({'data': data}, validate=False)
alfredsnippet.name: plot plotly aggregation basic
